attributes.action: Give keyworks a 3%rise and extra holiday NHS workers and carers 5% pay increase
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS has been stretched to its maximum with inadequate PPE and long hours and the fear of death on there shoulders to save lives. Even the prime minister. 

Other keyworkers are manning the essential shops that provide the food shops etc so you have food on the table etc
attributes.background: Would like the government to reward the nhs and key worker’s  with a wage rise from the government that they deserve

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for setting the salary of most key workers, but you may wish to sign petitions calling for the following actions:

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

Pay rise for NHS and care staff:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313488 

Pay bonus to all key workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

Identify and reward all key workers due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903

Make hazard pay mandatory for key workers in the midst of COVID 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

Give all key workers a 100% tax and Nat. Ins. holiday through COVID-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

Bonus for emergency services personnel working due to COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306
